post.desc:
I think Reimu seems to be in a bit of a hurry in Fossilized World? 'Cause this same-day repeating is definitely a bit bigger in scale for an incident – Suika's was just a few hours. And so, when there's no time for playing around, Reimu whips out the **Hakurei Shinken**.

Oh, an "[**Abeshi**](https://dic.pixiv.net/a/あべし)" is one of the more memorable death cries from the series that stuck. Like, in one of the video games, you actually collect tokens with that written on them.
